characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: The first time this model is slain, roll a D6 for each unit (friend or foe) within 3" of this model. On a roll of 2 or more, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. If at least one mortal wound is inflicted as a result of this, then this model is not slain, but remains in play with a single wound remaining. If no mortal wounds are inflicted, this model is slain.
